summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SimplyComply industries section functionality. All major features working correctly including industry display, modals, navigation, and URL parameter handling. One minor issue found with onboarding page authentication requirement.

integration_issues.issue: Onboarding page (/onboarding?industry=dental) redirects to login page, preventing testing of industry pre-selection in onboarding
integration_issues.note: This may be expected behavior if authentication is required for onboarding

passed_tests: Landing page shows exactly 8 industries in grid layout
View All Industries button shows correct count (21 industries)
Industry cards are clickable and open detail modals
Industry detail modal shows all required sections: overview, who it's for, regulatory bodies, compliance areas, example documents
Industry modal CTA 'Get this compliance pack' correctly navigates to /signup?industry=ID
View All Industries modal opens and displays industries grouped by category (Healthcare, Construction, Hospitality, etc.)
Clicking industry in All Industries modal opens detail modal and navigates to signup with correct parameter
Signup page with ?industry=dental correctly shows pre-selected Dental Practice Pack
Signup page with ?industry=construction correctly shows pre-selected Construction Pack
Signup page with ?industry=veterinary correctly shows pre-selected Veterinary Practice Pack
Industry pre-selection display includes correct icon, name, and 'pre-selected during setup' message
Industries data consistency verified - all 8 featured industries displayed correctly
Multiple industry types tested (dental, veterinary, construction) with correct modal content
Modal content verification: regulatory bodies, compliance areas, example documents all present
URL parameter passing works correctly across different industry types
All Industries modal categorization working (Healthcare, Construction, Hospitality categories found)
Industry count accuracy verified (21 total industries as expected)

success_percentage.integration: 100% (all URL parameter passing and modal interactions working)
success_percentage.data_consistency: 100% (industries data consistent between homepage, modals, and signup)

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Verify if onboarding page authentication requirement is intended behavior. If users should be able to access /onboarding?industry=ID without login, adjust authentication middleware. Otherwise, this is working as designed.
